Nerangs.ab: aiβiiō. vaŋᵛhibiiō. čašm andar zur konešn imā̊ zaoϑrā̊ haomauuaitīš gaomauuaitīš haδānaēpatauuaitīš aṣ̌aiia uzdātā̊ aiβiiō vaŋhibiiō apəmca haomiiąm čašm andar hāvan konešn asmanaca hāuuana aiiaŋhaēnaca hāuuana

"(He has to recite) aiβiiō. vaŋᵛhibiiō. and he has to gaze at the zur at imā̊ zaoϑrā̊ haomauuaitīš gaomauuaitīš haδānaēpatauuaitīš aṣ̌aiia uzdātā̊ aiβiiō vaŋhibiiō apəmca haomiiąm and he has to gaze at the hāvan at asmanaca hāuuana aiiaŋhaēnaca hāuuana."
